ithin mewani thaththwayak thula mewara ayawaya yojana walin rajya sewayata bandimata apeksha karana niladharinta methek himiwa thibu waraprasada sahasika lesa awalangu kara athi bawa sandahanya.meya pahadiliwama rajya sewaya kappadu kirime ejapa prathipaththiya bawa norahasaki.wisheshayen widhayaka shreniye niladharin rajaye sewaye randawa ganima udesa dena lada wiwida waraprasada kappadu kara atha.owunta pamanak wishesha waraprasada ayida kiya keneku prashna karannata ida atha.apata asannata aththe eki waraprasadawath nomathiwa widhayaka shreniye niladharin dushkara pedesaka karana sewaya kirimata labunoth owun eya bharagannawada yannaya.rajaye sewaye niladhariwadayakda nathuwa nowe.namuth eya wenamama katha kala yuthu deyaki.
